name: And They Would All Go Down Together (10 player)
descr: Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other in 10-player mode.
tooltip:
And They Would All Go Down Together (10 player)

Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other in 10-player mode.
